description: Persona traits in SOUL.md must align with behavioral directives in AGENTS.md
Every skill referenced in AGENTS.md must exist as a file in skills/
Every skill file must be referenced in the parent AGENTS.md
Communication style in SOUL.md must match interaction patterns in USER.md
Every agent must have tool policies defined
Memory directives must match agent capabilities and skill needs
Self-correction patterns must reference actual agent behaviors
All agents in openclaw.json must have corresponding AGENTS.md files
Skill bindings in openclaw.json must reference existing skill files
Persona traits must be internally consistent (no contradictions)
All agents in orchestration patterns must exist in the workspace
Failover targets must reference existing agents
Memory scaffolds must match backend configuration
Agent communication capabilities must match orchestration requirements
